comprehensive_overview: MONAI (Medical Open Network for AI) is a PyTorch-based, open-source framework for healthcare imaging. It provides domain-optimized foundational capabilities for developing medical imaging deep learning algorithms. MONAI enables the reproducible and scalable research for the development of novel imaging technologies and clinical applications.
core_features: Domain-specific transformations and dataloaders for medical image processing
Utilities for handling medical image metadata and visualization
Integration with PyTorch and deep learning libraries
Scalable infrastructure for reproducible medical imaging research
